title: Probability space
summary:
In probability theory, a probability space or a probability triple 
  
    
      
        (
        Î©
        ,
        
          
            F
          
        
        ,
        P
        )
      
    
    {\displaystyle (\Omega ,{\mathcal {F}},P)}
  
 is a mathematical construct that provides a formal model of a random process or "experiment". For example, one can define a probability space which models the throwing of a die.
